mount -o remount,rw /data MEM=`free -m | awk '/Mem:/{print $2}'` chmod 644 /sys/module/lowmemorykiller/parameters/minfree FG8=$(((8192*2/100)*1024/4)) VA8=$(((8192*3/100)*1024/4)) SS8=$(((8192*4/100)*1024/4)) HA8=$(((8192*7/100)*1024/4)) CP8=$(((8192*9/100)*1024/4)) EA8=$(((8192*14/100)*1024/4))

FG4=$(((4096*2/100)*1024/4)) VA4=$(((4096*3/100)*1024/4)) SS4=$(((4096*5/100)*1024/4)) HA4=$(((4096*7/100)*1024/4)) CP4=$(((4096*9/100)*1024/4)) EA4=$(((4096*14/100)*1024/4))
FG3=$(((3072*2/100)*1024/4)) VA3=$(((3072*3/100)*1024/4)) SS3=$(((3072*5/100)*1024/4)) HA3=$(((3072*7/100)*1024/4)) CP3=$(((3072*9/100)*1024/4)) EA3=$(((3072*14/100)*1024/4))
FG2=$(((2048*2/100)*1024/4)) VA2=$(((2048*3/100)*1024/4)) SS2=$(((2048*5/100)*1024/4)) HA2=$(((2048*7/100)*1024/4)) CP2=$(((2048*9/100)*1024/4)) EA2=$(((2048*14/100)*1024/4))
FG1=$(((1024*2/100)*1024/4)) VA1=$(((1024*3/100)*1024/4)) SS1=$(((1024*5/100)*1024/4)) HA1=$(((1024*7/100)*1024/4)) CP1=$(((1024*9/100)*1024/4)) EA1=$(((1024*14/100)*1024/4))
if [ "$MEM" -lt 8200 ]; then
echo "$FG8,$VA8,$SS8,$HA8,$CP8,$EA8" > /sys/module/lowmemorykiller/parameters/minfree
fi
if [ "$MEM" -lt 6200 ]; then
echo "$FG6,$VA6,$SS6,$HA6,$CP6,$EA6" > /sys/module/lowmemorykiller/parameters/minfree fi
if [ "$MEM" -lt 4200 ]; then

fi
